document_data.name: Cauldron of the Reach
document_data.georefs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20180313201211/http://www.candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_010203-05.htm| title = So Saith Ed Jan â€“ Mar 2005| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cauldron of the Reach''' was the cartographic name given to the waters between the isle of [[Thelve]] and the trio of islands known as the [[Crab Reach]], west of the library fortress of [[Candlekeep]].
document_data.Description: The Cauldron was a briny body of water on the western end of Thelve's hazardous northern shores into which the freshwater swamp of [[Taglan's Bones]] drained into. The "Cauldron of the Reach" name was used exclusively by [[sage]]s and scribes of Candlekeep as well as some [[bard]]s, never by local sailors.
